name: 2 Virtual Servers with SSH keys with one on a private network
description: A sample cloud resource template with 2 virtual servers, one on a private network.

metadata.displayName: 2 Virtual Servers with SSH keys with one on a private network
metadata.longDescription: Use this cloud resource template to quickly provision two Debian 7 64 bit virtual servers with ssh keys in a datacenter of your choice.  The first Debian Virtual Servers is connected to both private and public networks, the second virtual system is connected to the private network only.

bullets.title: Operating systems supported
bullets.description: IBM Cloud: Debian 8.6 x64 and Ubuntu 16.4.01 x64

bullets.title: Default virtual machine settings
bullets.description:
• IBM Cloud:
    • Debian 8.6
      • Flavor: Cores = 1, Memory = 1GB, Storage = 25GB SAN
      • Network: Private IP - Computed, Public IP - Computed
    • Ubuntu 16.4.01
      • Flavor: Cores = 2, Memory = 4GB, Storage = 25GB SAN
      • Network: Private IP - Computed, Public IP - Not Available

bullets.title: Usage and special notes
bullets.description:
1. Creates two virtual servers with ssh keys provided by the user in a datacenter specified by the user.
  2. First server will have both public and private IPs whereas the second server will only have a private IP.
  3. Deployment takes approximately 5 minutes to complete.
